item.description:
Join me on Wednesday, Sept. 14th from 8 – 9 pm for a   FREE introductory call:   The Secrets to Fearless and Fabulous Flirting.

Click here to sign up for this free teleclass!  Please note this is a separate sign-up page for only the FREE introductory call.  I’d love for you to join me on the call, even if you’re not sure about the coaching program.

During this   FREE call, you’ll learn the 5 simple steps to being a fabulous flirt!  You’ll walk away from the call with effective strategies that will knock the socks off those gorgeous, smart, and sexy men.

Put it on your calendar right now, because you won’t want to miss it:   Wednesday, Sept. 14th from 8 – 9 pm

*********************************

Here’s what participants had to say about the recent 21 Days to Summer Lovin’ Coaching Program for women:

“This was the perfect kick-off for me as I’m entering a phase in my life where I’m ready to do more for myself which includes finding someone to share life with.  I feel the information and the tools given were phenomenal. Robyn is an awesome facilitator and radiates warmth and love in a safe environment to share your experiences.  Robyn’s coaching is not just about the outward but also about looking within yourself. Robyn has helped me to know what I’m looking for in relationship and how to move forward in whatever has held me back. I am now stepping into something wonderful.  I highly reccommend any program that Robyn offers!!!” ~L. Lowell, MA
item.name: Secrets of Fearless and Fabulous Flirting - For Women
